asgn2Simulators.SimulationException

    Package Description
    asgn2Simulators  

    • Uses of SimulationException in asgn2Simulators

      Methods in asgn2Simulators that throw SimulationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Simulator.flyPassengers(int time)
      Wrapper to fly all passengers at the specified time
      void Simulator.generateAndHandleBookings(int time)
      Method to generate bookings according to Gaussian RNG, and to confirm, queue or refuse the bookings.
      Flights Simulator.getFlights(int departureTime)
      Method to grab the flight schedule for the specified day
      Bookings Simulator.getFlightStatus(int time)
      Method to report on the status of the flight schedule for the selected time
      java.lang.String Simulator.getSummary(int time, boolean flying)
      Status update at current time showing passengers across all aircraft in the schedule.
      void Log.initialEntry(Simulator sim)
      Log initial state of the simulation and aircraft Note we grab aircraft from first valid schedule
      void Log.logEntry(int time, Simulator sim)
      Log summary entry for each time step Note: Aircraft bookings appear only once Flights have begun
      void Log.logFlightEntries(int time, Simulator sim)
      Log Aircraft Transitions for each time step.
      void Simulator.processNewCancellations(int time)
      Method to traverse the flights over the cancellation period, performing Bernoulli trials for cancellation of each passenger.
      void Simulator.processQueue(int time)
      Method to process the queue based on state at time specified.
      void Simulator.processUpgrades(int time)
      Method to process upgrades across the daily flights at time specified
      void Simulator.queuePassenger(Passenger p, int queueTime, int departureTime)
      Method to add a Passenger to the simulator queue.
      void Simulator.rebookCancelledPassengers(int time)
      Method to explore rebooking of cancelled passengers up to Constants.CANCELLATION_PERIOD days after their intended departureTime.
      void SimulationRunner.runSimulation()
      Method to run the simulation from start to finish.
      void Simulator.updateTotalCounts(int time)
      Helper to update the total passenger counts with the latest flight schedule
